component.name: Odysseus
component.summary: Surf knowledge, entertainment, and services on The Web

description.p: Odysseus is a convenient and privacy-respecting web browser, that increasingly, gently, and unobtrusively guides you wherever you want to go online. Through this well thought out simplicity Odysseus lets you focus on the webpages that matter to you.
High-level features:

ul.li: Opens non-webpage links in 3rd party apps, or suggests ones to install

description.p: These features are completed to a high degree of polish.
